attributes.action: Legally classify the burning of poppies as a hate crime
attributes.additional_details:
We, the undersigned, petition HM Government to adjust the law to include the burning of poppies, as well as other desecrations of symbols of respect and rememberance, as a hate crime against the organisation it represents; in this case, our war veterans.

As a hate crime, not a freedom of expression, people performing this disgraceful action should be prosecuted.
